step.description: Enter several authors with intials into the several Search Rows and check "Exact matches only" checkbox for some of them. Click on the "Select Research Domain" button
step.expected: "Select Research Domain" page is opened correctly with proper results retrieved.

step.description: Select several organizations or "Include records that do not contain organization information" checkbox and click on the "Search" button.
step.expected: Author Search Results page is correctly opened with proper results retrieved

step.description: Prerequisite: Author Search Results page. Check Page Display
step.substep: Clicking Link 'Selected database link'. Expected result: True.
Clicking Link 'WOS'. Expected result: True.
General Search page was opened
Clicking Link 'Sign In'. Expected result: True.
Clicking Link 'Sign In'. Expected result: True.
Sign In Window was opened
Text box 'Email' is enabled
Text: 'quality.tester@testcases.com' was sent to the 'Email' textbox (XPath("//input[@id='email']")), textbox content after sending is 'quality.tester@testcases.com'
Text box 'Password' is enabled
Textbox: 'XPath("//input[@id='password']")' was cleared
Text: '!12345654321a' was sent to the 'Password' textbox (XPath("//input[@id='password']")), textbox content after sending is '!12345654321a'
Clicking Button 'SignIn'. Expected result: True.
General Search page was opened
Clicking Link 'Author Search'. Expected result: True.
Author Search page was opened

step.description: Refine by each category, exclude by some
step.expected: Refining and excluding are performed properly and are affected to the Record Sets tab.

step.description: Check the search terms are highlighted
step.substep: Checking/unchecking CheckBox 'ENERGY FUELS checkBoxin section Web of Science Categories'. Expected result: True.
